channel.description: Recent content on A. Brown Blogdown

item.title: About Me and The Blog
item.description: Hi There, This is my initial post on my blog! I am excited to have a space to share my thoughts, opinions, and data explorations on the internet. I donâ€™t do a whole lot of social media like Facebook, Twitter, etc. (Although, I do Snap Chat sometimes with some friends). So this will be a nice way to get what I think is important out there. A Little Bit About Me I have a wife who I enjoy spending time with.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
